scripts.start: openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:8080/enterprise/v3/api-docs -g typescript-angular -o src/app --global-property models --additional-properties=enumPropertyNaming=original,fileNaming=kebab-case && openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:8180/idp/v3/api-docs -g typescript-angular -o src/app --global-property models --additional-properties=enumPropertyNaming=original,fileNaming=kebab-case && npm run lint -- --fix && ng serve
scripts.enterprise: openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:8080/enterprise/v3/api-docs -g typescript-angular -o src/app --global-property models --additional-properties=enumPropertyNaming=original,fileNaming=kebab-case && npm run lint -- --fix
scripts.iam: openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:8180/idp/v3/api-docs -g typescript-angular -o src/app --global-property models --additional-properties=enumPropertyNaming=original,fileNaming=kebab-case && npm run lint -- --fix
